events.name: RHoK Global June 2012: Trento, Italy
events.about:
Once again FBK is going to host a Random Hacks of Kindness Global Hackathon this year at Trento Sience and Technology Hub. Come and join other developers in hacking for humanity on June 2 and 3 - a new way to celebrate Republic Day!

Free food and gadgets!

Check out the previous 2 editions on Flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/rhoktrento
